trans-unit.source: Controls code access permissions for event logging.
Do not grant <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission> to partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 不授予对部分受信任的代码的 <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission>。

trans-unit.source: The ability to read and write the event log enables code to perform actions such as issuing event log messages in the name of another application.
trans-unit.target: 读取和写入事件日志的能力使代码能够执行各种操作，如以另一个应用程序的名义发布事件日志消息。

trans-unit.source: If the event source that is specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the event log does not exist, a new event source is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果由事件日志的 <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性指定的事件源不存在，则创建新的事件源。

trans-unit.source: To create an event source in Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Windows Vista 与更高版本的 Windows 或 Windows Server 2003 中创建事件源，您必须拥有管理特权。

trans-unit.source: The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique.
trans-unit.target: 此要求的原因是所有的事件日志，包括安全性，必须进行搜索以确定事件源是否唯一。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问安全事件日志中。因此，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> class.
An array of objects that represent permission entries.
The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission.PermissionEntries" /> property is set to this value.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> class with the specified permission entries.
<paramref name="permissionAccessEntries" /> is <see langword="null" />.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the permission state (full access or no access to resources).
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> class with the specified permission state.
The <paramref name="state" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
One of the enumeration values that specifies an access level.
The name of the computer on which to read or write events.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission" /> class with the specified access levels and the name of the computer to use.
Gets the collection of permission entries for this permissions request.
A collection that contains the permission entries for this permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 包含此权限请求的权限条目的集合。
